column3: For use with the Russian Cyrillic Keyboard Layout
Replaces the instances of the Russian letter Э with the Ukrainian letter Є.
Has to be case sensitive with the (C) syntax
Probably has to have the (?) syntax, which will allow it to trigger within words.

column1: *C?OZ‖э‖SI‖En‖{U+0454}‖cyrillic small letter ukrainian ie  - Automatic Replace
*C?OZ‖Э‖SI‖En‖{U+00C2}‖cyrillic capital letter ukrainian ie - Automatic Replace
